description: This Java class provides mapping utility methods for converting between Note entities and their corresponding DTOs (Data Transfer Objects), such as NoteRequest and NoteResponse. The class is a final utility class with static methods for creating and updating Note entities and converting Note entities to response DTOs.

classes.name: NoteMapper
classes.description: A utility class for converting between Note entity objects and their DTO representations (NoteRequest and NoteResponse). It contains static methods for creating new Note instances from requests, updating existing ones, and generating response DTOs from entities.

methods.name: toEntity
methods.description: Converts a NoteRequest DTO into a new Note entity instance by copying title and content.

methods.name: updateEntity
methods.description: Applies updates from a NoteRequest DTO to an existing Note entity, updating its title and content.

methods.name: toResponse
methods.description: Converts a Note entity into a NoteResponse DTO, including its id, title, content, creation time, and update time.
